articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Egyptian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Egyptian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Sameh Lotfi Abdelhady, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Dae Meets AFP President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Dae Meets AFP President
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, had a talk with AFP President Emmanuel Hoog and his party who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Rejects UN Security Council's Press Release
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Rejects UN Security Council's Press Release
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Wednesday as regards the fact that the UN Security Council took issue with the DPRK's routine ballistic rocket launch exercise:
					 At the UN Security Council on September 6 the U.S. and its followers cooked up a press release again in which they found fault with the DPRK's measure for bolstering up nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 The DPRK categorically rejects this as an intolerable act of encroaching upon its dignity, right to existence, sovereignty and right to self-defence.
					
					 The recent ballistic rocket launch exercise of the Korean People's Army was successfully conducted without giving any negative impact to the security of the countries around the DPRK and the international waters as before.
					
					 The UN Security Council is not uttering a word about the brigandish act of the U.S. which is conducting nuclear war exercises for aggression after introducing huge nuclear war means including strategic assets into the Korean peninsula but is taking issue with the DPRK's legitimate measure for self-defence. This is utterly illogical.
					
					 The more viciously the UN Security Council finds fault with the DPRK's legitimate measures for self-defence by siding with the U.S., arch criminal harassing peace and security on the Korean peninsula, the more glaringly it will reveal its true colors as an unfair good-for-nothing entity before the international community.
					
					 The DPRK will continue to expand the signal successes of bolstering up the nuclear force in a phased way in this historic year when it started with the solemn blast of the first H-bomb test of Juche Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Demands Pullout of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Demands Pullout of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- September 8 this year marks 71 years since the U.S. military occupation of south Korea.
					 A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK in a statement Wednesday said that the 70-odd history of the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea has been the one in which war, confrontation and escalation of tension have persisted on the Korean peninsula, adding that the U.S. forces in south Korea are a cancer-like entity harassing peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region and bringing the dark clouds of a thermonuclear war. The statement went on:
					
					 After the end of the Second World War the U.S. occupied south Korea under the pretext of "disarming" the Imperial Japanese Army. Since then it, pursuant to its aggressive scenario for domination of Asia and world, divided the territory of Korea and the Korean nation and has inflicted the war disaster on the Korean people.
					
					 For the past six-odd decades since the signing of the Armistice Agreement, the U.S. introduced into south Korea and its vicinity huge aggression forces including nuclear weapons and staged the DPRK-targeted war exercises under various codenames, steadily escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The situation on the peninsula has constantly been put beyond control amid the evil cycle of escalation of tension. This is attributable to the arms buildup of the U.S. and the joint military exercises for aggression staged every year with the U.S. forces in south Korea as main force.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea have turned into "strategic task force" capable of intervening in any dispute in the region under the signboard of "strategic flexibility" and this has made its aggressive nature clearer. Recently, THAAD which includes even countries around Korea within the radius of operation was decided to be deployed in the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that unless the U.S. forces are withdrawn from south Korea as early as possible, it would be impossible to expect lasting peace and security on the peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 We opted for nuclear weaponization to safeguard the sovereignty, right to existence and peace and security of the country to stand up against the U.S. extreme hostile policy toward the DPRK and its threat of a nuclear war, and are bolstering up the nuclear deterrence for self-defence in every way, regarding it as its strategic line to simultaneously push forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S. has to clearly face up to the strategic position of the DPRK which ranked itself among the nuclear powers and the trend of the times and roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and withdraw its aggression troops and war means from south Korea at once.

articles.title: Appeal to Young Korean People
articles.content:
Appeal to Young Korean People 
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League issued an appeal to all the young Korean people at home and abroad on Wednesday.
					 The appeal said:
					
					 At the high platform of the Ninth Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League Marshal Kim Jong Un clarified the tasks for national reunification, clearly indicating the way of the Korean youth movement. This is the important guidelines which make the Korean youth discharge the sacred mission they assume for the era and history in the van of the patriotic sacred war for putting an end to the pain of division that has lasted for a long period and building a dignified and prosperous reunified power on this land.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League appealed as follows to all the young Korean people at home and abroad out of the burning mind to usher in a new era of independent reunification without fail by giving fullest play to the youthful stamina and passion, true to the call of Marshal Kim Jong Un:
					
					 All the young Korean people at home and abroad!
					
					 Let us discharge the noble mission for the country and the nation, holding high the slogan "Forward, young Korean people, toward bright future of reunified youth power!"
					
					1. Let us hold the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu and peerless patriot, as the lodestar of national reunification and the great leader of the Korean youth movement in high esteem!
					
					2. Let us pave a wide avenue to national reunification by pooling youthful intention and mind on the road of reunification and patriotism, holding high the banner of national independence, the banner of great national unity!
					
					3. Let our young people take the lead in opening a new phase of improved inter-Korean relations and national reunification, invariably taking hold on the three charters for national reunification and the historic north-south joint declarations as immortal great programmes for national reunification!
					
					4. Let us check and frustrate the war moves for aggression by the U.S. and its followers to inflict nuclear disaster on the nation and make the flames for independence against the U.S. and for democratization against fascism rage more furiously in south Korea!
					
					5. Let overseas young people cherish the pride and self-esteem of the dignified Korean nation and make proactive contribution to the sacred cause for independent reunification of the country and prosperity of the nation! 
					
					 The appeal proposed to hold the great gathering of young Korean people for reunification in which youth organizations of all social standings and young people in the north, the south and abroad will participate to promote the movement for national reunification in a more unique and viable way  in conformity with the unanimous desire of all Koreans aspiring after reunification. 
					
					 If all young Korean people, the most viable unit of the nation, turn out, there is nothing impossible in the world and the final victory of national reunification is certain, the appeal concluded.

articles.title: C.C., DFRK Calls for Bringing about New Dawn of Independent Reunification and Prosperity of Nation
articles.content:
C.C., DFRK Calls for Bringing about New Dawn of Independent Reunification and Prosperity of Nation
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea (DFRK) sent an appeal to the whole Korean nation on Wednesday in connection with the lapse of 71 years since the U.S. imperialist aggression forces occupied south Korea.
					The appeal said that it is hard to find such absurd and unlawful brigandish act as the occupation of south Korea by the U.S. imperialist aggressors in any other parts of the world. It went on:
					
					The U.S. imperialists divided one territory and one blood vessel of one nation into two and lorded it over south Korea as a de factor ruler for decades but there is neither single document nor a single paragraph of agreement that can support even its mere form. This is the truth about the U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea.
					
					Steadily training and replacing their hand-raised running dogs, the U.S. imperialists turned south Korea into their permanent colony and egged pro-U.S. stooges on to the acts for hostility, confrontation and aggression against the DPRK and mover for stifling it, deliberately standing in the way of achieving national reunification.
					
					The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea are the root cause of all disaster and pain suffered by the Korean nation in its modern history and they are a pronoun of aggression and war and symbol of injustice and evil.
					
					The withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea is a matter of urgent concern of the international community and countries around Korea aspiring after stability and development of the region and it is a top priority political task.
					
					The world progressive forces loving justice and aspiring after peace should pay due attention to the Korean nation's struggle against the U.S. and war that has lasted century after century and render active support and encouragement to the just sacred war for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					The U.S. should clearly understand that its justification or pretext for its aggression forces' presence in south Korea will no longer work.
					
					The U.S. imperialist aggressors should make a proper option at the present crucial crossroads if they do not want to be a wandering spirit without even label in the second Korean war.
					
					The appeal noted that no one can block the advance of the Korean nation to drive the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea and usher in a new era of independent reunification and peace and prosperity, and the final victory belongs to the Korean nation.

articles.title: Charge d'Affaires ad Interim of Brazilian Embassy Gives Reception
articles.content:
Charge d'Affaires ad Interim of Brazilian Embassy Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Cleiton Schenke, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Brazilian Embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Wednesday on the 194th anniversary of the independence of Brazil.
					 Present there on invitation were Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Kuk Ryong, director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, Pak Kyong Il, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys and staff members of international organizations here.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Samjiyon County
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Samjiyon County
Samjiyon, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troup gave a premiere in Samjiyon County Wednesday on its performance tour of local areas.
					 Among the audience were working people of different circles and officials in the county.
					
					 Female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and female duet "His Humanity" impressively depicted boundless reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un who is making devoted efforts to make hurrah of the Workers' Party resound far and wide before any other place in Samjiyon which was recorded in the first page of the history of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Light music "Higher and Faster", tap dance "Youth Days" and other numbers mesmerized the audience who are displaying the honor of the Mallima standard-bearers in building an economic giant. 
					
					 Folk dances full of beautiful and elegant national flavor instilled joy and optimism into the audience who are performing laudable feats in the 200-day campaign.
					
					 The performance tour goes on.

articles.title: Performance of Primary Organizations of Trade Unions Held
articles.content:
Performance of Primary Organizations of Trade Unions Held
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A performance of primary organizations of the trade unions across the country was given at the Cultural Hall of the Ministry of Railways Wednesday on the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Among the audience were Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, officials concerned, officials and members of the trade unions and workers. 
					
					 Primary organizations of the trade unions selected at the contest of the performance staged a performance.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as chorus of revolutionary hymn "Ode to General Kim Jong Un" and "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by demonstrating the DPRK to the world as the socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and providing an eternal foundation of prosperous Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 Such numbers as story and song "Voice of My Heart" truthfully represented the personality of Marshal Kim Jong Un as a peerlessly great man.
					
					 Put on the stage were also such numbers as chorus poem "Let us dynamically launch 200-day campaign of loyalty".

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad on Sept. 4.
					 In the message the president extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the friendly Korean people on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on his own behalf.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the Korean people greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 It assured him of the stand of the Syrian Arab Republic to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK in the interests of the two friendly peoples on this significant occasion.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lao Presiden
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Lao President Bounnang Vorachith on Sept. 5.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations and the best wishes to you and, through you, to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the government and fraternal people of the DPRK on behalf of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and the Lao government and people and on my own behalf on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 I am very pleased that the diligent and brave Korean people have increased the national power of the DPRK, developed science and achieved enormous successes in the efforts to modernize the country's defense capabilities and further improve the people's living standard under the wise leadership of the WPK over the past 68 years.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that the DPRK will steadily grow stronger to be a powerful and prosperous nation by attaining the goals set by the Seventh Congress of the WPK under your leadership though the DPRK is facing all sorts of difficulties and hardships at present. 
					
					 I feel proud that the traditional and good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries have reached a new high level, bringing substantial benefits to the peoples of the two countries and contributing to boosting the cooperative relations for peace, stability and development in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 On this auspicious occasion, I sincerely wish you good health and bigger new successes in your noble work and you will as ever lead the Korean people to a fresh victory in defending the country, building a socialist state and achieving the peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Muhammadu Buhari, president of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill ahead of the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket was laid before the statues on Wednesday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here on Wednesday laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill ahead of the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.

articles.title: AFP President Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
AFP President Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- AFP President Emmanuel Hoog and his party visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home, they were briefed on the revolutionary career of the President and patriotic career of his family members and looked round historical relics preserved with much care.
					
					 They toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph and the Sci-Tech Complex.

articles.title: Participants in National Meeting of Workers Active in Planning Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in National Meeting of Workers Active in Planning Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national meeting of workers active in planning visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They went round historical mementoes and relics displayed at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, deeply recollecting the undying feats of the President and the noble careers of his patriotic and revolutionary family members of Mangyongdae.
					
					 They were told about the stories on historical relics preserved with much care at the low-roofed thatched house in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They also toured the historic site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 They looked round the supreme command post taken by President Kim Il Sung, the place where he had talks with heroes of the Republic and model soldiers of the Korean People's Army (KPA), etc.
					
					 They visited the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery, where they laid bunches of flowers at the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" and observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs.
					
					 They also toured the Sci-Tech Complex and had a pleasant time at Rungna Dolphinarium and Munsu Water Park.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Nature Museum, Central Zoo
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Nature Museum, Central Zoo
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Nature Museum and the Central Zoo Wednesday on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The guests looked round various places of the museum and the zoo.
					
					 They made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Nampho, September 7 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Nampho Port Wednesday to celebrate the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present there were captains and crewmen of Chinese Taipei-flagged ship Zhang Hong 1 and Vietnamese-flagged ship Anthinh Phu 08.
					
					 The speakers said that Kim Il Sung led the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory to liberate the country and founded the DPRK, genuine people's country.
					
					 Thanks to the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il the DPRK could demonstrate its dignity and might as a people-centered independent state shedding its rays all over the world, they noted.
					
					 Stressing that rosy is the future of the DPRK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, they wished the Korean people bigger success in their drive for the prosperity of the country and national reunification.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: More Remains of Martyrs Buried at Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
More Remains of Martyrs Buried at Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- More remains of martyrs were buried at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri.
					 Among them were An Kyong Ho, former director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country, Ri Chan Bok and Ri Tong Gyu, former general officers of the Korean People's Army, and Jon Myong Sop, anti-Japanese patriotic martyr.
					
					 An Kyong Ho devoted all his energies to the work for glorifying the feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for national reunification till the last moments of his life, and remained boundlessly loyal to the Party.
					
					 Ri Chan Bok, as a member of the juvenile guerrilla during the Fatherland Liberation War, bravely fought against the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and reliably safeguarded the Party, revolution and socialism in the forefront of defending the country for decades.
					
					 Ri Tong Gyu, who grew up to be a prestigious army surgeon under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, devoted himself to medical science research and education with the single mind to remain loyal to the trust of the Party which put forward him as labor hero, academician, professor and doctor and showed paternal loving care for him.
					
					 Jon Myong Sop, who grew up to be a member of the revolutionary organization in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolution and lived a glorious life, remained loyal to the Party, while devoting himself to the education.
					
					 Ceremonies of burying the remains of the martyrs were held at the cemetery on Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea arrived here Tuesday to celebrate the 68th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK. 
					 They included Takao Kamakura, director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party, a delegation of the Committee of Self-Reliance Studies in Sri Lanka led by Chairman W. A. Duminduwardane, delegation of the German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il led by Woznak Manfred,  delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of India led by Vijender Jain , Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, and Miguel Vivanco Salinas, chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Arriving here earlier were a delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Italy led by Marsiletti Andrea and Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Juche Idea Followers Visit Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School
articles.content:
Juche Idea Followers Visit Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of the Juche idea study organizations toured Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School on Wednesday on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They paid tribute to the art piece depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il among schoolchildren.
					
					 They looked round classrooms, gymnasium, dormitory, etc.
					
					 They also toured the Sci-Tech Complex.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegations, Delegates of Organizations for Study of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Delegations, Delegates of Organizations for Study of Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and gift from the director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party and gifts from the vice-director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, a delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Mongolia, a delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand and the chairman of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics on a visit to the DPRK on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket and gifts were separately handed over to an official concerned on Wednesday.
					
					 Gifts to Kim Jong Il from the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies, the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy were conveyed on the same day.

articles.title: Sci-tech Achievements Made in Agriculture of DPRK
articles.content:
Sci-tech Achievements Made in Agriculture of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the DPRK have made signal achievements conducive to the nation's agricultural development.
					 Presented to the 31st National Festival of Science and Technology recently held at the Sci-Tech Complex in Pyongyang were many valuable agro-technical findings and products.
					
					 They include a system for building and searching database on the country's soil analysis that helps control the land resources in a unified way.
					
					 There are also a method of evaluating crop estimate of grain based on information technology and a balanced vibrating combined soil machine which ensures plowing and harrowing at the same time.
					
					 And a newly-developed rice seed-covering material raises the germination rate of seed 95 percent while reducing the scale of damage from underground harmful insects.

articles.title: Another Tele-education System Established in DPRK
articles.content:
Another Tele-education System Established in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, the Tele-education College under Kim Hyong Jik University of Education in the DPRK began its nationwide tele-education.
					 It developed a system for ensuring the tele-education in an integrated way and solved sci-tech problems arising in the introduction of it throughout the country.
					
					 At present the college has such subjects as normal education, education information, literature and music. More subjects are expected to appear within this year.
					
					 Anyone can enjoy its tele-education system.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik University of Education has served as an academic and data service center for teachers' schools.

articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China Leaves
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China led by Chairwoman Kim Yong Nyo left here Wednesday after taking part in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.

articles.title: People's Revolutionary Government, First Power in DPRK
articles.content:
People's Revolutionary Government, First Power in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- With the approach of the founding anniversary of the DPRK, the Korean people recall the historic days when the first revolutionary power came into being in the country.
					 In the early years of his revolutionary activities, President Kim Il Sung regarded the question of power as the main issue of the revolution and set forth the line of building a Juche-based power. And he had wisely led the work to establish a people's revolutionary government at guerrilla bases around the River Tuman in conformity with specific conditions of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Commune and the Soviet were the only forms of working-class government at that time. But they were inconsistent with conditions of Korea, a colonial semi-feudal society where the capitalist development was repressed due to the occupation by the Japanese imperialist aggressors.
					
					 From this point of view, Kim Il Sung delivered a speech "The People's Revolutionary Government Is Genuine People's Power" at the assembly for setting up the people's revolutionary government in Gayahe, Wangqing, in March Juche 22 (1933). 
					
					 In his speech he stressed that the people's revolutionary government is a power based on the worker-peasant alliance led by the working class and on the united front of broad masses of people standing against the Japanese imperialist aggressors and it is a genuine people's power run by the people as its masters.
					
					 Later, district people's revolutionary government appeared in most guerrilla bases around the River Tuman with peasant committee in some areas. The people's revolutionary government distributed the land free to inhabitants and enforced such popular policies as eight-hour working system, free education and free medical services, bringing about great social reforms in the bases.
					
					 After all, the people's revolutionary government served as a prototype of the people's power founded in Korea after its liberation from Japan's colonial rule on August 15, 1945.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Steady Progress for Victory in 200-Day Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Making Steady Progress for Victory in 200-Day Campaign
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday editorially calls for making ceaseless attack and uninterrupted advance for the victory in the 200-day campaign and thus glorifying this significant year as a year of proud struggle and victory to be specially recorded in the history of the Party and the country.
					 All the people are registering proud achievements in the 200-day campaign of loyalty, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The workers in the fields of electricity power, coal and metal industries and railway transport have made a decisive breakthrough towards the victory in the 200-day campaign by hitting without fail the high goals set by themselves.
					
					 Keeping pace with the four vanguard sectors, the building materials, chemical, mining and machine industries, forestry, light industry and other fields have brought about an unprecedented surge in production.
					
					 The agricultural workers are devoting themselves to the work for attaining the goal of grain production set forth by the Party despite unfavorable climate conditions.
					
					 Scientists and technicians have made many valuable achievements in the drives to bolster up the capability for self-defence, update the national economy and locally produce equipment and materials required.
					
					 Service personnel and builders are creating new legendary stories about construction in Juche Korea at the construction site of Ryomyong Street and other major construction sites.
					
					 Party members, people, service personnel, youth and students have grown strong in faith and self-development-first spirit in the course of the 200-day campaign. This is the most valuable success.
					
					 The achievements made in the on-going campaign are very great and its victory is certain but a lot of huge tasks are facing us and the hostile forces are getting ever more desperate in their efforts to block our advance.
					
					 Now is the time for all Party members and other working people to make ceaseless attack and uninterrupted advance to successfully conclude the 200-day campaign.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Trumpeting about "Human Rights"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Trumpeting about "Human Rights"
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the White House in the recent press conference reeled off a spate of vituperation peppered with lies and fabrications, expressing "concern" over the "human rights situation" in north Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is no more than a cynical ploy of those taken aback by the DPRK's successful test-fire of SLBM to divert the world's attention to its "human rights issue." 
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in vociferating about the "human rights issue in north Korea" is to label the DPRK "human rights abuser" and bring down the socialist system through international pressure. 
					
					 Over the past several decades, the U.S. has persistently threatened the DPRK's sovereignty with nuclear weapons since it divided Korea into two parts and posed grave threat to the Korean people's right to existence through various forms of sanctions and pressure. Therefore, it is preposterous and the height of impudence for the U.S. to voice "concern" over someone's "human rights situation".
					
					 It is imprudent for the U.S. to take issue with "human rights" of other countries though it is in such poor position that it can hardly handle a sea of human rights problems in its mainland, unaware of its daily waning muscle. 
					
					 The U.S. is the world's worst human rights abuser. 
					
					 The U.S. has neither qualifications nor right to play the role of "a human rights judge" as it is beset with all sorts of human rights abuses.
					
					 The U.S. desperate "human rights" campaign aimed to stifle the DPRK would only heighten the Korean people's hatred for the former and exceptionally increase their efforts to bolster up the nuclear force.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification of His Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses S. Korean Puppet Minister of Unification of His Reckless Remarks 
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Hong Yong Phyo, south Korean puppet minister of Unification, at a recent international meeting again hurled mud at the DPRK, crying out for "the north's dismantlement of nuclear weapons" and ballyhooing about "a new opportunity."
					 Commenting on his rigmaroles, Minju Joson Wednesday says:
					
					 What he uttered proves once again that he is a faithful servant of traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 Hong's utterances are just the same as the invectives spouted by Park escalating the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 Hong is ill-famed not only for being a wicked anti-reunification confrontation maniac but also for being an idiot. He took the lead in working out "north Korea policy" such as "confidence-building process" under the present regime and cooking up the "Preparatory Committee for Unification" under unanimous fire by the public at home and abroad as a plot-breeding organ for "unification through absorption." It goes without saying that such human scum is not qualified to become the head of an organ looking after the issue of inter-Korean relations, the issue of reunification.
					
					 Nevertheless, such guy as Hong was appointed as minister of Unification overnight for his belly-crawling before Park. No wonder, he is called the "man serving the president."
					
					 It is quite natural that the south Korean public is getting increasingly vocal demanding the resignation of Hong, source of disaster.

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Make Switchover in Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges U.S. to Make Switchover in Policy towards DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- In recent days experts on Korean affairs and media of the world share the views that the DPRK has made very rapid progress in the strategic offensive force.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday observes: 
					
					 Just as analyzed by experts and media, the fate of the U.S. is under the thumbs of the DPRK however hard the former tries to deny it.
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. neither recognizes this stark reality nor drops its foolish dream, sticking to its old-fashioned way of thinking.
					
					 The U.S. is absorbed in an old-fashioned confrontational concept, failing to seek a reasonable solution from an objective point of view. This stereotyped attitude can help anyone guess the intellectual level of the politicians of the U.S. styling itself "the only superpower."
					
					 This tells that a country cannot become a big power for having a huge territory and large population.
					
					 If a country wants to claim to be a big power, it should pursue politics befitting it and have a way of thinking as such.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in the policy of strength, preoccupied with the confrontational concept of the Cold War era, failing to notice the changed reality as now, it will never escape policy failures but become a laughing stock of others.
					
					 If the U.S. persistently infringes upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK, the latter will proudly stand up against the U.S. and inflict a disgraceful setback upon it.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to come to its senses, though belatedly, drop its wild dream of stifling the DPRK and make a bold decision to make a policy switchover.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Additionally Deploy Nuclear Subs Spark New Arms Race
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Additionally Deploy Nuclear Subs Spark New Arms Race
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Navy is planning to induct newly built Virginia-class attack nuclear-powered submarine Illinois into the U.S. Pacific Fleet next month, according to Yonhap News of south Korea September 2.
					 The U.S. Navy is mulling letting this sub loaded with attack weapons including Tomahawk start its operation from next year.
					
					 It is also planning to additionally get five nuclear-powered subs like Illinois in the future and start the project of increasing the number of missile launchers of these warships and firing range from 2019.
					
					 The U.S. is massively deploying subs in the Asia-Pacific and driving the situation to dangerous phase.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that world media warned the U.S. massive deployment of nuclear submarines might put Northeast Asia in the whirlwind of arms race of nuclear subs.
					
					 The U.S. tries to browbeat the DPRK with nuclear subs, but it is a foolish dream.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Raps at Ruling Forces' Sycophancy toward U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Raps at Ruling Forces' Sycophancy toward U.S.
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on September 5 accused Park Geun Hye of claiming in her "address marking August 15" that there is wrong trend of negatively describing south Korea and words depicting south Korea as a place hard to live are expanding.
					 Words of the ruling forces that if the trend of "globalization" is not accepted, economy would go bankrupt have been revealed to be a lie, the editorial noted.
					
					 It said that neo-liberal "globalization" is only the golden remedy which would help the rich get richer.

articles.title: S. Korean Pro-U.S. Stooge Expelled from Rally Place
articles.content:
S. Korean Pro-U.S. Stooge Expelled from Rally Place
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A riffraff of the south Korean puppet military was expelled from the candlelight rally scene by citizens of Kimchon City on September 2, according to the south Korean internet paper OhmyNews.
					 There took place a candlelight rally at the plaza of Kimchon Railway Station that day under the sponsorship of the Kimchon Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment.
					
					 When the rally was at its peak, the chief of the planning room of the puppet Ministry of Defense sneaked into the place only to be detected by the chairman of the Nongso-myon Committee for Struggle against THAAD Deployment.
					
					 Enraged participants booted him out of the place.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally Protests against THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally Protests against THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- More than 1 500 Kimchon citizens, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea held a candlelight rally at Kimchon Railway Station plaza on September 1 in protest against the puppet Defense Ministry's moves to deploy THAAD, according to south Korean internet newspaper OhmyNews.
					 The speakers bitterly accused the Defense minister of turning down the demand of the representatives of the citizens for the retraction of the THAAD deployment while claiming that it is an inevitable defensive step to cope with "the north's nuclear and missile threat."
					
					 If THAAD ensures security, it is better to deploy it at Chongwadae, they noted, calling on the citizens of Songju and Kimchon to pool efforts to pull it out of south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Disturbing Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Disturbing Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster 
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Minju Party of south Korea held a press conference at the "National Assembly" on Sept. 4 to blast the puppet regime for its sinister moves to disturb the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, according to south Korean newspaper Herald Economy.
					 He said it was disclosed through a hearing of the Ad Hoc Committee for the Investigation into the Ferry Sewol Disaster that at that time the maritime police used just a 19mm-pipe for inhaling air into the hull.
					
					 It was also disclosed that the maritime police inhaled air into the steering room though it claimed it inhaled air into the dining room, adding its assertion was no more than a window-dressing to dodge public criticism, he noted.
					
					 He urged the regime to stop the irresponsible act of concealing the truth behind ferry Sewol disaster and guarantee the period of the Ad Hoc Committee's investigation into the truth.

articles.title: S. Korean Religious Body Declares Action against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Korean Religious Body Declares Action against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Ronal Buddhism, a south Korean religious body, made public a statement on Sept. 5 to declare an action against THAAD deployment, according to south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 It said that THAAD deployment is by no means for peace on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Noting that there is no place in south Korea for THAAD deployment, it called on religionists to pool their efforts to check the authorities' moves for its deployment.
					
					 It declared the formation of the Ronal Buddhist measure committee for the withdrawal of THAAD and the Songju and Kimchon regional measure committees.

articles.title: Japan's Apology and Reparation for Explosion of Ship Ukishima-maru to Massacre Koreans Demanded
articles.content:
Japan's Apology and Reparation for Explosion of Ship Ukishima-maru to Massacre Koreans Demanded
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting for remembering the forcible Korean draftees who were ruthlessly killed by the Japanese imperialists through the explosion of ship Ukishima-maru was held in Maizuru City, Kyoto, Japan on August 24.
					 Speakers said 71 years have passed since the Ukishima-maru explosion but neither probe into the truth about it nor Japan's apology and reparation have been made.
					
					 They held that the grudge of the cruelly massacred Koreans should be settled as early as possible. 
					
					 Memorial messages from the Rights and Welfare Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other parts of Japan were introduced at the meeting.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated in India, Nigeria
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Celebrated in India, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India held a seminar, book exhibition and film show and a Nigerian foodstuff company held a film show on Sept. 1 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed in the venue for the exhibition were books dealing with the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India said that the DPRK, founded on Sept. 9, 1948, developed into an impregnable powerful socialist country under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and invariably defended the banner of socialism, smashing the vicious moves of the imperialist allies to stifle and isolate the DPRK.
					
					 He noted that thanks to HE Kim Jong Un, the DPRK is displaying its might more fully.
					
					 The Korean people will further bolster up the capability for self-defense and build a socialist power on the Korean land without fail under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, he added.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held at the branch groups under the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on August 31 and September 1 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The chief of a branch group said in a report:
					
					 As led by the great leaders, the DPRK has always won victory in the confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces, being possessed of the tremendous political and military might no one dares provoke.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens, founded the Juche idea, the Songun idea, defeated the Japanese imperialists through the armed struggle and achieved the liberation of the country.
					
					 He defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world with his gifted military idea, strategy and tactics and commanding art.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il resolutely shattered the moves of the hostile forces to stifle the DPRK with his unique Songun politics, true to the intention of the President.
					
					 The history and tradition of victory of the DPRK are shedding its rays more brightly thanks to Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chief of another branch group said that under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un the DPRK emerged as a nuclear weapons state possessed of even H-bomb.

articles.title: Russian Body Flails U.S. Hostile Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Body Flails U.S. Hostile Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia issued a statement on September 1 denouncing the U.S. imperialists' hostile moves against the DPRK.
					 The U.S. imperialists are resorting to war moves to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The UN Security Council should denounce the U.S. brazenfaced and reckless act.
					
					 The U.S. should respond to the proposal of the DPRK for signing a peace treaty at an early date.
					
					 The U.S. should withdraw its forces and nuclear weapons from south Korea.
					
					 It should also roll back its hostile moves against the DPRK.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Myanmar Personage
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK Observed by Myanmar Personage
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, made public a statement on September 2 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The great President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK representing the interests of all the Korean people on September 9, 1948, an event of national significance which brought about a fundamental turn in hewing out the destiny of the country and its people.
					
					 The history of the DPRK that has lasted nearly seven decades is the glorious history in which it has been strengthened into the dignified and prosperous powerful state under the outstanding and tested leadership of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into the country independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence with their iron will and distinguished leadership, setting a brilliant example in building a socialist power.
					
					 The undying feats the great leaders performed for the founding and strengthening of the DPRK are now being successfully carried forward by HE Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Italian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Italian Body
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was posted by the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea of Italy on its website on Sept. 3.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), elucidates the ideas that one should hold fast to the ideological work and give priority to it to successfully accomplish the socialist cause and the main task to be carried out in the ideological work is to model the whole society on the socialist idea and that the ideological work should be conducted on the principle and way which are in conformity with the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador egipcio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales de nuevo embajador egipcio 
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales de Sameh Lotfi Abdelhady que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de Republica Arabe de Egipto en la RPDC. 
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Vocero del MINREX condena el comunicado del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU
articles.content:
Vocero del MINREX condena el comunicado del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestiono el normal ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohete balistico de la RPDC, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio hoy la siguiente respuesta:
					Los Estados Unidos y sus fuerzas seguidoras volvieron a inventar el dia 6 en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU un comunicado que cuestiona las medidas de la RPDC para intensificar su disuasivo nuclear de caracter autodefensivo.
					
					Rechazamos rotundamente ese documento calificandolo de un intolerable acto de violacion a la dignidad, el derecho a subsistencia, la soberania y el derecho de autodefensa de la RPDC.
					
					Como de siempre, el reciente entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos de nuestro ejercito se realizo exitosamente sin dar ninguna influencia negativa a la seguridad de los paises perifericos y las zonas maritimas internacionales. 
					
					Es un acto absurdo el que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestiona las justas medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC sin pronunciar ninguna critica a Estados Unidos que perpetra todas las barbaridades inclusive el entrenamiento de guerra nuclear de caracter agresivo introduciendo las propiedades estrategicas y otros enormes medios de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Cuanto mas el CS de la ONU sigue cuestionando las legitimas medidas autodefensivas de la RPDC poniendose al lado del pais norteamericano que destruye la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, tanto mas mostrara su naturaleza de la entidad inutil e injusta ante la sociedad internacional.
					
					Seguiremos ampliando los exitos asombrosos del fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares que se logran de manera escalonada en este ano historico que comenzo con el trueno de la primera bomba H de Corea del Juche.

articles.title: MINREX demanda la retirada de tropas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
MINREX demanda la retirada de tropas norteamericanas del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El dia 8 se cumplen los 71 anos desde cuando EE.UU. ocupo militarmente la parte sur de Corea.
					En la declaracion del dia 7 el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea senalo que el periodo de mas de 70 anos desde la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano por las tropas norteamericanos es la historia en que perduraban la guerra, el enfrentamiento y la agravacion de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y continuo:
					
					Hoy dia, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea devienen un ente canceroso que perjudica la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y acarrea el nubarron de la guerra termonuclear.
					
					Despues del fin de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, EE.UU. ocupo el suelo surcoreano bajo el pretexto de "desarme" de los imperialistas japoneses, dividio a la nacion y el territorio de Corea en dos partes persiguiendo la ambicion agresiva de dominar Asia y el resto del mundo y acarreo los desastres de la guerra al pueblo coreano. 
					
					Durante mas de 60 anos que datan de la firma del Acuerdo de Armisticio, introdujo en el suelo surcoreano y su contorno las amas nucleares y otras enormes fuerzas armadas agresoras y agravo ininterrumpidamente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region librando los ejercicios belicos conjuntos anti-RPDC de diferentes formas. 
					
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra permanentemente en la situacion incontrolable y repite el circulo vicioso de la agravacion de la tension, debido al aumento armamentista de EE.UU. y a los ejercicios militares conjuntos agresivos que se desarrollan cada ano bajo el mando de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea.
					
					Bajo el cartel de la "flexibilidad estrategica", estas tropas yanquis se transformaron como "tropas de movilidad estrategica" que puedan intervenir en los conflictos  regionales mostrando mas claramente su caracter agresivo. Estos dias, tratan de emplazar en el Sur de Corea el sistema antimisiles THAAD que toma a su alcance operacional hasta los paises perifericos. 
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que sin retirar los uniformados estadounidenses del Sur de Corea no se puede esperar en la paz duradera ni el aseguramiento de seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Hemos optado el armamento nuclear para defender la soberania, la subsistencia, la paz y la seguridad del pais frente a la politica extremada de hostilidad y la amenaza de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. contra la RPDC y consolida por todos los medios el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa tomando como linea estrategica el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					EE.UU. debe revocar la anacronica politica de hostilidad a la RPDC, dandose clara cuenta de la corriente de la epoca y de la posicion estrategica de la RPDC en la lista avanzada de las potencias nucleares, sustituir el Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de paz y retirar de inmediato sus uniformados y pertrechos de guerra acantonados en la parte mitad del territorio coreano.

articles.title: CC de Union de la Juventud llama a todos jovenes coreanos ponerse al frente de la causa por la reunificacion de la patria
articles.content:
CC de Union de la Juventud llama a todos jovenes coreanos ponerse al frente de la causa por la reunificacion de la patria
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista envio  hoy a todos los jovenes coreanos en el interior y exterior del pais un llamamiento intitulado "Logremos lo mas pronto posible la victoria final de la causa de reunificacion de la patria dedicando el corazon de la juventud".
					En el IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, el Presidente Kim Jong Un ilumino claramente el camino a seguir por el movimiento juvenil de Corea y presento las tareas combativas para la reunificacion de la patria que sirven de guia programatica para que los jovenes cumplan con su sagrada mision asumida ante la epoca y la historia en la delantera de la sagrada lucha patriotica para acabar con el sufrimiento de la division que perdura durante largo tiempo y levantar sobre este territorio una digna y prospera potencia reunificada, senala la nota y prosigue: 
					
					Partiendo del ardiente deseo de los jovenes de abrir a toda costa la nueva epoca de reunificacion independiente desplegando el impetu y la pasion de la juventud en respuesta al llamamiento del Presidente, el Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista envia este llamamiento a todos los jovenes coreanos en el interior y exterior del pais. 
					
					!Todos los jovenes coreanos en el interior y exterior del pais!
					
					!Vamos a cumplir la sagrada mision asumida ante el pais y la nacion enarbolando la consigna combativa: "!Adelante los jovenes coreanos hacia el futuro radiante de la potencia reunificada de la juventud!"!
					
					1. !Enaltezcamos mas altamente al estimado camarada Kim Jong Un, general insigne del Paektu y patriota sin igual, como estrella orientadora de la reunificacion de la patria y gran dirigente del movimiento juvenil coreano!
					
					2. !Vamos a abrir el ancho camino de la reunificacion de la patria uniendo el proposito y el alma de la juventud en el camino patriotico para la reintegracion bajo la bandera de la independencia nacional y gran unidad nacional!
					
					3. !Que los jovenes pongamonos en la delantera en preparar la nueva coyuntura por la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur y la reunificacion de la patria al tomar invariablemente las Tres Cartas de la Reunificacion de la Patria y las historicas declaraciones conjuntas intercoreanas como gran programa inmortal de reintegracion territorial!
					
					4. !Frustremos las maquinaciones provocativas de guerra de agresion de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras tendentes a acarrear el desastre nuclear a la nacion y avivemos mas vigorosamente las llamaradas por la independencia antiyanqui y la democracia antifascista en el suelo surcoreano!
					
					5. !Que los jovenes ultramarinos contribuyan activamente a la sagrada causa por la reunificacion independiente de la patria y la prosperidad nacional al guardar el orgullo y dignidad de la digna nacion coreana!
					
					El llamamiento propuso el gran acto de jovenes coreanos por la reunificacion en que participan las organizaciones juveniles y jovenes de distintos sectores del Norte, el Sur y Ultramar para impulsar mas animadamente el movimiento de reunificacion de la patria conforme al unanime deseo de todos los coreanos aspirantes a la reunificacion.
					
					Y enfatizo que si se movilizan todos los jovenes coreanos que forman el destacamento mas activo de la nacion no habra nada imposible en el mundo y es afirmativa la victoria final de la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: FDRP llama a acabar con ocupacion de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
FDRP llama a acabar con ocupacion de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea 
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria emitio el dia 7 un llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana con motivo del 71o aniversario desde cuando las tropas agresoras norteamericanas ocuparon el Sur de Corea. 
					El documento revela que en el mundo no hay otra barbaridad tan extravagante, atrevida e ilicita como la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano por parte de los invasores norteamericanos, y continua:
					
					Los invasores norteamericanos dividieron en dos partes el territorio patrio y la nacion homogenea y actuaron durante varios decenios como gobernadores del Sur de Corea, pero no tienen ni un papel de documento ni un parrafo de convenio para respaldarla. 
					
					Los imperialistas yanquis convirtieron el Sur de Corea en su eterna colonia formando y sustituyendo consecutivamente a sus lacayos fieles, y obstaculizan de manera artificial el camino de la reunificacion de la nacion coreana impulsando a sus sirvientes pronorteamericanos a la hostilidad, el enfrentamiento, la agresion y la campana de aplastamiento contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea constituyen la fuente de todos los desastres y sufrimientos registrados en la historia moderna de la nacion coreana, el pronombre de la agresion y la guerra, y el simbolo de la injusticia y la maldad.
					
					La retirada de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea es la apremiante tarea politica y asunto de interes inminente de la sociedad internacional y los paises perifericos que desean la estabilidad y el desarrollo de la region. 
					
					Las fuerzas progresistas del mundo aspirantes a la justicia y la paz deben prestar la atencion merecida a la lucha antiyanqui y antibelica de la nacion coreana que continua siglo tras siglo y apoyar activamente su justa y sagrada guerra por la retirada de las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el suelo surcoreano. 
					
					EE.UU. debe darse clara cuenta de que no tiene ningun pretexto para mantener la presencia de sus uniformados en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Si los invasores norteamericanos no quieren perder su vida en la segunda guerra coreana y convertirse en restos mortales sin certificados de servicio militar que vagabundearan varios siglos, deben tomar una opcion correcta en el dilema de hoy. 
					
					Nadie puede detener el avance de la nacion coreana, decidida a expulsar a los agresores norteamericanos y abrir una nueva era de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad. 
					
					La victoria final es de la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Presidente de Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de Presidente de Laos 
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le remitiera el dia 5 el Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, Bounnhang Vorachith.
					El texto va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 68o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hago llegar a Vd. y por su conducto, al Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el gobierno y el hermano pueblo coreanos las calurosas felicitaciones y saludo en nombre del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, el gobierno y pueblo laosianos y en el mio propio. 
					
					Estoy muy complacido de que durante 68 anos el diligente y valiente pueblo coreano logro grandes exitos en fortalecer el poderio estatal de la RPDC, desarrollar las ciencias, modernizar la capacidad de defensa nacional y mejorar cada dia mas la vida del pueblo bajo la sabia orientacion del PTC.
					
					Estoy convencido de que bajo la guia de Vd., la RPDC se desarrollara incesantemente como pais prospero segun la meta indicada por el VII Congreso del PTC, aunque sufre ahora las dificultades y pruebas de toda indole. 
					
					Ademas, pienso con orgullo que las tradicionales y excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises se desarrollan en una nueva etapa elevada dando provechos sustanciales a los pueblos de los dos paises Laos y Corea y contribuyendo a fomentar los vinculos de cooperacion para la paz, estabilidad y desarrollo de la region y el mundo. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad jubilosa, le deseo de todo corazon a Vd. buena salud y mayores y nuevos exitos en su noble trabajo y conducir de continuo a la nueva victoria al pueblo coreano en la defensa de la patria y en el cumplimiento de la causa por la construccion de un Estado socialista y por la reunificacion pacifica de Corea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Presidente de Siria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Presidente de Siria
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un,  Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 4 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva senala:
					
					En ocasion del 68o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, extiendo las sinceras felicitaciones a Su Excelencia y, por su conducto, a su amistoso pueblo, en nombre del pueblo arabe de Siria y en el mio propio y deseo a Su Excelencia buena salud y felicidad, y a su pueblo, mayor progreso y prosperidad. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad significativa, reafirmo a Su Excelencia la posicion de la Republica Arabe de Siria de fortalecer y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la RPDC conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises amistosos.
